name: Insignia: Tactics
summary: Welcome to the world of Insignia: Tactics, where the bonds of friendship and comradery are forged in the fires of unending conflict. You are Rayl, nephew to the Archon of Artesia. You'll stop at nothing to protect your country and family, but your foes are many and equally persistent. Somebody has it out for you, and it will take great courage and resolve to defeat them. Can you solve the mystery of the war and bring those responsible to justice?
